headline: Schumer And Pelosi Plan Response Trumps Prime Time Address
summary: Sen. Chuck Schumer and House Speaker Nancy Pelosi will give a response to President Trump's prime-time national address on Tuesday evening. “Now that the television networks have decided to air the President’s address, which if his past statements are any indication will be full of malice and misinformation, Democrats must immediately be given equal airtime," said Schumer.
